alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 7:11PM EDT until September 08 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WORCESTER AND NORTHWESTERN MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 710 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jaffrey to Fitzwilliam to near Templeton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fitchburg, Gardner, Athol, Winchendon, Townsend, Templeton, Westminster, Ashburnham, Hubbardston, Ashby, Phillipston, Royalston, and Petersham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
